alert.note: Alert for Greenlee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 1:57PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by a prolonged period of rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Arizona, including the following county, Greenlee, including Eagle Creek near Morenci. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. The low water crossing on Lower Eagle Creek Road will be impassible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 157 PM MST, The water level in Eagle Creek will continue to increase through Tuesday causing flooding of low water crossings, especially near the town of Morenci. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwestern Greenlee County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
